title: Trump says he'll be 'very good to Canada,' as its prime minister drops some tariffs
summary: After Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced he would lower tariffs, President Trump said "We want to be very good to Canada. I like Carney a lot. I think he's a very good person."

title: Trump says 'We want to be very good to Canada,' as its leader drops some tariffs
summary: After Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced he would lower tariffs, President Trump said "We want to be very good to Canada. I like Carney a lot. I think he's a very good person."

title: Meta partners with Midjourney on AI image and video models
summary: Meta's Chief AI Officer said that the company is partnering with Midjourney to license its AI image and video model technology.

title: Amazon's new deal with Hertz taps into $1 trillion used car market
summary: Amazon partners with Hertz to grow its auto business as more consumers turn to used cars amid soaring new vehicle prices.

title: DRC prosecutor seeks death penalty for former leader Joseph Kabila
summary: Congolese military auditor general asks court to condemn Kabila to death for war crimes including homicide and torture.

title: Putin optimistic about Russia-US relations as Trump threatens sanctions
summary: Both Russia and Ukraine are trying to show US President Donald Trump that they are ready to try to strike a peace deal.

title: Trump Announces Furniture Imports Probe, Setting Up Tariffs
summary: President Donald Trump said the US is conducting a “major Tariff Investigation on Furniture coming into the United States,” setting the stage for industry-specific levies.

title: OPINION: The power of the channel
summary: How MSPs drive cybersecurity and IT sales and why they must evolve
